post.author: dslee28
post.content:
수고하신 모든 분들께 박수를 보냅니다.

고생 많으셨습니다. 다음은 마켓에 등록될 내용입니다.

###### Flying Dishes ######
This is a proto type of Android game from COSKA(http://www.coska.com) and CommunityOne.
*** If you are a public Android user, this is not what you are looking for. If you are a beginner Android developer this might be helpful resource. ***
This was experimental open source project from 2 developer groups(COSKA & CommunityOne).
The source code will be released as soon as we finish cleaning up the code :)
--- Game Play ---
-Hit "Start" button
-Press the button at bottom-right corner and hold
-When you release the button the chef will jump
-You can touch the chef and drag and release from right to left
-Dish will shoot out of the chef and hit the bubbles.
-When you hit all the items that are displayed on the left of the screen, you clear the round before time run out.
This project is developed by all volunteers.
--- Project Designed & Developed by ---
Alex Lee (이창준)
Brian Heo (허현옥)
Byung Yong Kim (김병용)
Chang Jeon Lee (이창전)
Chulgun Lee (이철건)
Jacob Ki (김경환)
Ki Hup Boo (부기흡)
Miyoung Chung (정미영)
Ritchie Hwang (황대현)
Sooyong Sim (심수용)
Spencer Hwang (황성규)
Thomas Kim (김형태)
*** Whitecat Software Inc did not involved on this particular project. Whitecat Software Inc is lending the publishing account to those group(COSKA & CommunityOne) for temporary. This app will be removed from Whitecat Software Inc publication list as soon as those group(COSKA & CommunityOne) setup their own account. ***
post.title: 드뎌 안드로이드용 게임 Flying Dishes 가 마켓에 등록 되었습니다.
